script.name: !fight.attack.object.carrier
script.sourceplaintext:
$managed = [TRUE] $aShips = [THIS] ->get managed ships: role=Fighter if not size of array $aShips $managed = [FALSE] $aShips = [THIS] -> get owned ships: class/type=Moveable Ship
$i = size of array $aShips while $i dec $i = $ship = $aShips[$i] if [THIS] ->is ship managed: ship=$ship remove element from array $aShips at index $i continue end $docked = $ship -> is docked if not $docked == [THIS] remove element from array $aShips at index $i continue end $owner.race = $ship -> get owner race if $owner.race != [OWNER] remove element from array $aShips at index $i continue end end end
if not size of array $aShips do if [THIS] -> get current laser strength @ = [THIS] -> call script !fight.attack.object.std : the victim=$victim follow in new sector=$follow only target shields?=$onlyShields return null end
while $victim -> exists @ = wait 100 ms
do if is a new script version available break
while [THIS] -> is docked @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock : @ = wait 500 ms end
gosub sub.MoveSector gosub sub.CheckTarget gosub sub.Idle
$ships.controlling = 0
$i = size of array $aShips while $i dec $i = $ship = $aShips[$i] if not $ship -> exists remove element from array $aShips at index $i continue end $owner.race = $ship -> get owner race if $owner.race != [OWNER] remove element from array $aShips at index $i continue end
$ship.sector = $ship -> get sector skip if $ship.sector == [SECTOR] continue if $managed @ do if [THIS] -> call script !lib.carrier.isshipbusy : Ship=$ship Allow Recall=[FALSE] continue end if $onlyShields START $ship -> command COMMAND_ATTACK_SHIELDS : arg1=$victim, arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=null else START $ship -> command COMMAND_ATTACK : arg1=$victim, arg2=null, arg3=null, arg4=null end inc $ships.controlling = end
gosub sub.MoveSector gosub sub.CheckTarget $target.dist = get distance between [THIS] and $victim while $target.dist > 12000 @ = wait 100 ms gosub sub.MoveSector gosub sub.Idle gosub sub.CheckTarget @ = [THIS] -> follow $victim with precision 10000 m : timeout=20000 ms gosub sub.CheckTarget gosub sub.MoveSector gosub sub.Idle $target.dist = get distance between [THIS] and $victim end
$shouldAttack = [TRUE] if not $ships.controlling $shouldAttack = [TRUE] else if not [THIS] -> get current laser strength $shouldAttack = [FALSE] else if [THIS] -> is of class M1 $shouldAttack = [FALSE] else if [THIS] -> is of class TM $shouldAttack = [FALSE] else if [THIS] -> is of class TL $shouldAttack = [FALSE] else if $victim -> is of class Fighter $shouldAttack = [FALSE] end end
if $shouldAttack @ = [THIS] -> call script !fight.attack.object.std : the victim=$victim follow in new sector=0 only target shields?=$onlyShields gosub sub.MoveSector else gosub sub.MoveSector @ = wait 30000 ms end end
gosub sub.DockHome return null
sub.CheckTarget: skip if $victim -> exists return null endsub
sub.Idle: gosub sub.CheckTarget while not [THIS] -> has same environment as $victim @ = [THIS] -> move around 20000 ms gosub sub.CheckTarget end endsub
sub.MoveSector: gosub sub.CheckTarget $victim.sector = $victim -> get sector if [SECTOR] != $victim.sector gosub sub.DockHome if $follow [THIS] ->set destination to $victim.sector @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$victim.sector [THIS] ->set destination to null else return null end end endsub
sub.DockHome: if $managed @ = [THIS] -> call script !carrier.recall : else $i = size of array $aShips $waiting.ships = array alloc: size=$i while $i dec $i = $ship = $aShips[$i] if not $ship -> exists remove element from array $aShips at index $i continue end $owner.race = $ship -> get owner race if $owner.race == [OWNER] $homebase = $ship -> get homebase if $homebase -> exists $waiting.ships[$i] = $ship @ START $ship -> call script !ship.cmd.returnhome.std : end end end
while size of array $waiting.ships do if is a new script version available break @ = wait 5000 ms
$i = size of array $waiting.ships while $i dec $i = $ship = $waiting.ships[$i] if not $ship -> exists remove element from array $waiting.ships at index $i continue end $owner.race = $ship -> get owner race if $owner.race != [OWNER] remove element from array $waiting.ships at index $i continue end if $ship -> is docked remove element from array $waiting.ships at index $i continue end $homebase = $ship -> get homebase if not $homebase -> exists remove element from array $waiting.ships at index $i continue end if $homebase != [THIS] remove element from array $waiting.ships at index $i continue end
if not $ship -> is docking allowed at [THIS] remove element from array $waiting.ships at index $i continue end
if not [THIS] -> is docking possible of $ship remove element from array $waiting.ships at index $i continue end
$cmd = $ship -> get command skip if $cmd == COMMAND_RETURN_HOME @ START $ship -> call script !ship.cmd.returnhome.std : end end end endsub return null

line.text: is a new script version available
is a new script version available
